txt.en: 'Soon I will pass into the West, but now I must release my old ties.'
'Speak with one of the attendants if you are troubled. They seem to understand your problems as if they were their own.'
'The beauty of this place reminds me of my home. But I am also saddened by the memories summoned by the ruins over the hill.'
'The White Ships are calling to me, but still I linger dwelling on my old life.'
